name: ASCII BASIC GAME 10Liner - Bomber Game!
description:
This game is for the Oric Atmos, a UK 8bit home computer from 1983 and was made for the ASCII BASIC Game 10Liner Jam.

Game is simple - your bomber is running out of fuel and needs to land but there is a derelict city in the way.  Use your bombs to destroy the empty buildings and clear the way for you to land.  Press any key to drop a bomb..if you manage to clear the strip, then the difficulty increases and you start all over!

Interesting features of this 10 line game:

  • Using the ROM alternate character set for blocky graphics
  • Multi-channel sound.. well 2 channels anyway! :-D
  • Multi-colour graphics
  • Increasing difficulty

Screenshot shows the listing - being 10 lines doesn't need more than 1 screen!
